summary.p: Transcriptions of Tamil inscriptions, from Pākūr, Tiruvakkarai by Ariel and possibly other hands. Some were apprently copied from volumes belonging to Gallois-Montbrun (see f112r).
Contains also a Sanskrit text in Nāgarī, translations, descriptions of temples, maps, drawings, cakkarams, syllabaries.
Various papers of various format hinged or bound, seemingly partly in disorder, in one volume.

The volume contains:
f1-f3: map/plan. There are in fact 2 folios (f2-f3) pasted on f1.
f4-f9: transcription of inscriptions in Tamil script.
f10: transcription of an inscription in Tamil script.
f11-f13: description in French of the temple at Tiruvakkarai. Independent foliation 1-3. 5 pages.
f14-f15: temple map (Tiruvakkarai?). 2 folios folded in two.
f16-f18: transcription of inscriptions (original script in the left column; standardised version in modern Tamil script in the right column). 6 pages.
f19-f33: copy of appendix of Ellis’ Mirasi Rights (see f33v). 5 quires hinged and numbered in black pencil 420a to 420e. Written recto verso.
f34-f36: drawing of the wall and base of a temple with eye-copies of inscriptions on location.
f37: transcription of an inscription in Tamil script.
f38: TBC.
f39-f47: transcription of inscriptions in Tamil script. The inscriptions are numbered: no. 34, 35 (f39r-f40r); 32 (f41r); 31 (f42r-f43r); 29 (f45r); 30 (f45v-f46r). f40-f43 are one subset in this series (same paper, same format). f45r = original script in the left column; standardised version in modern Tamil script in the right column (similar to the folios in the series f49-f71). These folios appear to be misplaced in the volume and should probably come after f71 to have a continous numbering of the inscriptions.
f48: intertitle page Inscriptions tamiles. 1ère section Bahour 1852. 1 à .
f49-f71: transcription of inscriptions from Pākūr (Bahour). Original script in the left column; standardised version in modern Tamil script in the right column. 29 inscriptions numbered from 1 to 29 (f71r = no. 29).
f72: intertitle page copies originales d'inscriptions à Bahour.
f73-f82: transcription of inscriptions from Pākūr in Tamil script.
f83: intertitle page Tiruvakkarai 12 au 1? Août 52.
f84-f108: transcription of inscriptions from Tiruvakkarai (original script in the left column; standardised version in modern Tamil script in the right column, as it happens [not always completed]).
f109-f110: translations into French.
f111: TBC.
f112: intertitle page Diverses inscriptions relevées dans différentes pagodes du Sud de l’Inde copiées sur deux volumes manuscrits appartenant à M. A. Gallois-Montbrun.
f113-f239: transcriptions of inscriptions in Tamil script. Some folios written only on one page. With a numbering system for the inscriptions. From various places, including Citamparam (see f119r).
f240: intertitle page Inscriptions tamiles 1852
f241-f245: transcriptions of inscriptions in Tamil script. f241 is a folio folded in two.
f246-f266: translations of inscriptions (from Pākūr apparently) into French. Numbered 1 to 29.
f267: TBC.
f268-f270: on Shivaji and the Kumpakōṇam Māmakam. 5 pages.
f271: extract from the Kāvyaprakāśa
f272: Littérature. Extraits..
f273: intertitle page papiers divers
f274: cakkaram.
f275: cakkaram (one folded folio).
f276-f278: syllabary (Nāgarī and Grantha). f277-f278 is a folio folded in two.
f279: cakkaram.
f280: Tacamaṇimālai
f281: cakkaram (?) in the form of a lotus (colour painting; a folio folded in two).
f282-f288: cakkarams with labels.
f289: TBC.
f290-f291: INSCRIPTION BILINGUE DE THUGGA (printed item; 2 folios folded in two).
f292-f293: INSCRIPTION BILINGUE DE THUGGA (printed item, same as preceding; 2 folios folded in two).
f294: intertitle page Inscriptions sanskrites 1852
f295-f296: transcription in devanāgarī (one folio folded in two).
f297-f325: Nāgarī/Brāhmī syllabary (versos blank).
f326-f329: translation of 9 inscriptions into French.

collation.desc: 1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Element of library binding.

327 folios = Ariel Papers: Tamil & Sanskrit Inscriptions. Arabic library foliation 1-329 in black ink. f2-f3 pasted on f1. f4-f8 = foliated on the blank page of the folio. f37-f38 pasted on an unfoliated folio. f107-f108 pasted on an unfoliated folio. Foliation 326-329 corrected from 325-328.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Element of library binding.

handNote.desc: Several hands: Ariel's hand, but not only. See f33v.

origin.origDate: Several internal dates: 1844 (f113r, f140r, f150r), 1850 (f33v), 1852 (f48r, f240r, f294r).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Mostly an autograph work by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Rosny, Léon de (1868). La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In: Variétés orientales (pp. 177‒224). Paris: Maisonneuve.
